## Attachment interface

Attachments together with \[\[Geometry\]\] define the meshes and the objects of a \[\[Scene\]\].

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface Attachment 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [edgeIndex](./harp-datasource-protocol.attachment.edgeindex.md) | [BufferAttribute](./harp-datasource-protocol.bufferattribute.md) | Optional additional buffer index used to create an edge object. |
|  [groups](./harp-datasource-protocol.attachment.groups.md) | [Group](./harp-datasource-protocol.group.md)<!-- -->\[\] | The draw \[\[Group\]\]\]s of this \[\[Attachment\]\]. |
|  [index](./harp-datasource-protocol.attachment.index.md) | [BufferAttribute](./harp-datasource-protocol.bufferattribute.md) | The index \[\[BufferAttribute\]\]. If not provided the index buffer of the \[\[Geometry\]\] will be used. |
|  [name](./harp-datasource-protocol.attachment.name.md) | string | The name of this \[\[Attachment\]\]. |
|  [uuid](./harp-datasource-protocol.attachment.uuid.md) | string | The unique uuid of this \[\[Attachment\]\]. |
